title: Adjust desktop header logo typography for “ribbit”

requirements.summary: Update the desktop header logo text “ribbit” inline typography to the specified letter-spacing and font size while keeping the current font family and weight unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, the desktop logo span rendering the text “ribbit” uses inline style letterSpacing set to '-0.035rem'.
In frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, the desktop logo span rendering the text “ribbit” uses inline style fontSize set to '1.7rem'.
The logo continues to use fontFamily '"Tilt Warp", cursive, sans-serif' and fontWeight 400.
No other header layout/behavior changes are introduced.

file_operations.description: In the desktop logo <span> that renders the text “ribbit”, update the inline style values: set letterSpacing to '-0.035rem' and fontSize to '1.7rem', leaving fontFamily '"Tilt Warp", cursive, sans-serif' and fontWeight 400 unchanged. Do not change any other header styling, layout, navigation, search, or dropdown behavior.
